title.rendered: Successful use of Social Media from an “old-school” real estate agent

content.rendered:
Market Leader is pleased to announce that we have partnered with ActiveRain University to offer an exciting new webinar to help agents better grow and manage their business with social media. Coming on May 19, this webinar will feature Katrina Benton, a smart agent from Anchorage, AK.

As a third generation REALTOR® she is extremely knowledgeable about time-honored skills in the business-but she’s also embraced technology and is actively using Facebook, a blog, and more, to close more business.

Key takeaways from this webinar include:

  • The old-schooler’s secrets to success with new technologies
  • Smart ways to track prospective clients along the purchase decision process
  • How to convert online leads into closed sales.

We’re inviting all agents to this webinar. Here are the full details: “Cashing In On Social Media”

  • When: Wednesday, May 19
  • Time: 10:00 AM Pacific / 1:00 PM Eastern
  • Cost: NONE

We look forward to having you join us!
